text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Vlissingen | other_name = Flushing | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Vlissingen Town.png | image_alt = | image_caption = Clockwise from top left: Coastline skyscraper, harbour, museum, residential tower and boulevard with beach | image_flag = Vlissingen vlag.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Vlissingen wapen.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0718 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Vlissingen in a municipal map of Zeeland | map_caption = Location in Zeeland | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Netherlands | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Zeeland | parts_type = | parts_style = coll | parts = 8 Districts |p1=Binnenstad |p2=Middengebied |p3=Paauwenburg-Westduin |p4=Lammerenburg |p5=Oost-Souburg |p6=Ritthem |p7=Binnen- en Buitenhavens |p8=Sloegebied | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = D66 | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Letty Demmers-van der Geest | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 1 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = Vlissinger | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 4380â€“4389 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 0118 | website = | footnotes = }} Vlissingen, Zeelandic: Vlissienge, English: Flushing, is a city, municipality and seaport in the province of Zeeland, the Netherlands. The city has about 33,000 people. The municipality has about 44,000 (2016). It has been an important harbor for centuries. Most of the Royal Netherlands Navy ships are built in Vlissingen. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Port cities and towns of the North Sea Category:Cities in Zeeland Category:Municipalities of Zeeland
title: Vlissingen
